as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2ajOaNBDTXAem4A1ZEtI-2" value="<div><b>container-recipes</b></div><div>github repository<br></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="120" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" width="110" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: 2) all affected Dockerfiles trigger a rebuild of their matching containers

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 542px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3a) newly built containers are pushed to a temporary location in container registry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 332px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 3b) status is reported back to CI/CD service

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 112px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 4) CI/CD executes optional test stage job on HPC platform and result is reported back

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 200px; margin-left: 352px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 5) CI/CD service instructs build farm to push container to a persistent location
